lead_paragraph: SPRAYREGEN--Nicholas (Nick), on July 13, 2016. Owner and president of Tuck-It-Away Storage. Founder and managing member of Rising Development. Beloved husband of Jaynee, devoted father of Matthew, Emily, Jonathan, Benjamin and Lilee Bea. Also survived by his loving mother Fredrica and father Gerald, former wife Karen, siblings Lisa and Pamela. He will be missed by extended family and many friends. Service Thursday, July 14th, 1pm at "The Riverside," 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave. Contributions in his memory may be made to Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center, Melanoma and Immunotherapy Research under Dr. Jedd Wolchok. 1/3
